meanings.definition: A type of durable, yellowish cotton fabric.
meanings.sent1: She sewed a dress using nankin fabric.
meanings.sent2: The curtains were made of soft nankin material.
meanings.sent3: The nankin cloth was so tough, it could withstand any spill.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like nankin, strong and unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The nankin fabric felt like sunshine in her hands.

meanings.sent1: The walls were painted in a lovely shade of nankin.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful dress in a soft nankin hue.
meanings.sent3: The nankin color of the flowers brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as warm as the nankin sunset.
meanings.sent5: The nankin sky was a peaceful backdrop to their picnic.

meanings.sent1: The antique shop displayed delicate nankin bowls.
meanings.sent2: She collected rare pieces of nankin porcelain.
meanings.sent3: The nankin teacup seemed to whisper ancient tales.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of nankin pottery was a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The nankin vase gleamed under the soft light.
